item.title: Update Environment Variables
item.description: We all know the scenario, a managed solution has been imported but one of the variables has been set incorrectly. How do I go and update this to the correct value? Within Dataverse there are 2 tables called ‘Environment Variable Value’ and ‘Environment Variable Definition’ these store the value of each variable and the definition of the variable respectively. The following guides will explain how to build a canvas app and/or a Flow to update the values only.
